Address.university_name: Zamorano Universidad – EAP Escuela Agrícola Panamericana

GeneralInformation.History: Founded in 1942 - the university was the inspiration of Samuel Zemurray, an American philanthropist and banana businessman. Botanist and arborist Wilson Popenoe joined Zemurray's effort by creating Zamorano University's unique educational system and becoming its first president.
